text: Polypodium abitaguae is a species of fern in the family Polypodiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== abitaguae Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Critically endangered flora of South America Category:Taxa named by William Jackson Hooker
title: Polypodium abitaguae
